ComicInfo.Summary:
Exodus, part 2
Strange things are happening in Moscow: new portals from Hell keep appearing throughout the city, and new demons emerge on Earth with each one. Determined to put an end to this, Demonslayer decides to seek the assistance of the "MCK", a mysterious organization that upholds the balance of good and evil in our world. Their leader Felix Dzerzhinsky assigns "MCK" officer Pavel to Danila to provide support and call for reinforcements when the need arises... Meanwhile, Yana finds and captures the demoness that opened the most recent portal, and now our heroes must question her to find out more about the events that drove the Underworld restless...
